summary: 6 Female Presets for the Abyssal Dremora Race by Halo
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=4]The Abyssal Dremora Race is seriously amazing!
If you do not know about it, it was created by HaloMod and is one of the best race mods out there in my opinion. 
It is manual install, but includes many customization options.
I ended up with 6 characters that I probably won't use anymore but their faces are too cute just not use! 
So, I present to you my six little Dremora that you can now play as! 

There are 2 presets for each race. 
Ignis:[i] Estie & Oskie[/i]
Nox:[i] Prisem & Spectra [/i]
Silva: [i]Briar & Aphalie
[/i]
Please share your screenshots! 
I would love to see them


[b]REQUIRED MODS: 
[/b]
SKSE

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624]Racemenu[/url]﻿

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000]XPSME(for the race mod)[/url]﻿

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411]Brows[/url]﻿

[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/abyssal-dremora-race/]Abyssal Dremora Race by Halo (external site)[/url]﻿

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311]KS HAIDOS (Lastest Version) [/url]﻿

[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82990]Sentiment Eyes (any version) [/url]﻿


[b]SOFT REQUIRED:[/b]
[url=http://tetrodoxin.tumblr.com/post/152073967797/halloween-set-part-3-the-empty-throne-part-1]Waldgeist Textures by Tetrodoxin (external site) [/url]﻿
(You will need to replace the Silva textures with the Waldgeist ones to get the right looks for Briar/Aphalie.)
(You do not need to do this step, but I do not know what they will look like without them, so be warned.) 
(Also, Tetro is the creator of Snapdragon Prime ENB and Frecklemania, so you know these textures are going to be awesome!)

ENB used is[url=https://rd.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/70451] SNAPDRAGON PRIME[/url]﻿ & [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90473]RYA ENB[/url]﻿

[/size]Permissions: 
You can do whatever you like with them as long as you provide a link of credit to this page.[/center]
author: Kikiapplus
